channel.title: genetics on Jimmy Tang
channel.description: Recent content in genetics on Jimmy Tang

item.title: genetic classification of populations using supervised learning
item.description: In the past few months, in my spare time whenever I get a chance, I’ve been working on a side project in work. It’s a research project amongst a group of people with a cool idea. The idea is to apply neural networks to identifying diseases, populations and traits via machine learning/supervised learning. I’m not entirely sure about the application of the technology as to how new or revolutionary it is, but it seems sensible that a machine is going to be very good at being taught how to recognise patterns so why not do it.
